PLAY.TITLE: The Two Gentlemen of Verona

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: DUKE OF MILAN, Father to Silvia.
THURIO, a foolish rival to Valentine.
EGLAMOUR, Agent for Silvia in her escape.
SPEED, a clownish servant to Valentine.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Verona; Milan; the frontiers of Mantua.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Verona. An open place.
SCENE II. The same. Garden of JULIA's house.
SCENE III. The same. ANTONIO's house.
SCENE I. Milan. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE II. Verona. JULIA'S house.
SCENE III. The same. A street.
SCENE IV. Milan. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SILVIA, VALENTINE, THURIO, and SPEED

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The same. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter SPEED and LAUNCE several ly

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. The same. The DUKE'S palace.
SCENE VII. Verona. JULIA'S house.
SCENE I. Milan. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE II. The same. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE I. The frontiers of Mantua. A forest.
SCENE II. Milan. Outside the DUKE's palace, under SILVIA's chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter, at a distance, Host, and JULIA in boy's clothes

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same.
SCENE IV. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter LAUNCE, with his his Dog

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Milan. An abbey.
SCENE II. The same. The DUKE's palace.
SCENE III. The frontiers of Mantua. The forest.
SCENE IV. Another part of the forest.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Outlaws, with DUKE and THURIO
